as over 25 million individuals in florida continue to be without power the inhabitants are now engaged in postdisaster cleanup and evaluating the extensive destruction inflicted by hurricane frances the most potent tempest to strike the states central eastern coast in half a century

google appears to be on the brink of officially providing pop access as indicated by a message found in their support database thirdparty tools have already enabled this functionality but anticipation has been building for google to incorporate it themselves

washington witnessed a slowdown in the us economys momentum during the second quarter as it achieved only a lackluster 28 percent annual growth rate beyond what was originally forecasted the dampened consumer activity characterized by cautious spending patterns played a crucial role in this underwhelming performance

seeking financial relief us airways has formally appealed to the court overseeing its bankruptcy case requesting the termination of existing labor contracts that govern the roles of passenger service agents flight attendants mechanics and other staff members the airline is advocating for the substitution of these agreements with more economical alternatives

microsoft the worlds largest software maker has expanded its windows xp starter edition pilot program to include russia they released a simplified version of windows xp specifically for the asian market

china telecoms companies  39in olympic pitch 39 huawei technologies and zte the leading chinese telecommunications equipment makers say they are in discussions to become sponsors of the 2008 olympic games in beijing
